content: I was trying some examples in the Lean Reference manual in Lean 4 that uses "assume". It seems that Lean 4 doesn't have "assume" anymore since it gives me an "unknown identifier" error. What would be the replacement for it in Lean 4?
I think assume used to just be another way of spelling intro
I see. So basically the syntactic sugar "assume" has been eliminated from Lean 4.
